Html:
Hi,
let me first repeat that your controls are awsome. Please continue your great work.


What I constantly need (and miss) are a docking extension and a grid (similar to Outlook 2003).

I've searched the internet a lot and the best solution for docking I've found is the DockPanel by Weifen Luo (see http://sourceforge.net/projects/dockpanelsuite).

An interesting implementation of a grid control can be found here http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/OutlookGrid.asp.

If these controls could be added the Ascent control collection would blast everything else.

Greetz to all, Metal-Frog

Thank you. :-)

The docking will be done in version 2.0 along with the Tabbed MDI control. We need the Tab control that is being worked on now to get it done.

Several members have been looking at an Outlook like grid. It’s not on the list yet but I’m sure it will be.

Thanks,
Scorn
